title: One Stubborn Horse
subtle: Humorous (fiction), 64 words, Level C (Grade K), Lexile 90L
description: In One Stubborn Horse, students will enjoy a humorous story about a horse that, no matter what, refuses to budge an inch. Use this story to teach students how to analyze character and accurately retell a story. Entertaining illustrations, repetitive sentence structure, and high-frequency words support early emergent readers.
meta: begged, brushed, fed, stubborn, tickled, washed
Capitalization and Punctuation : Recognize and use correct capitalization and punctuation
Compound Words : Identify and use the high-frequency words not, she, would

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
